config.shatter.prop.enableBossShatter.co:
The reason this is disabled by default is due to rendering issues that may occur due to some boss' unique models.
Good examples are the Minecraft's Ender Dragon, and TwilightForest's Naga and Hydra.
config.shatter.prop.enableChildShatter.c:
The reason this is disabled by default is due to rendering issues that occur due to the way Minecraft rescales children.
Shattering child mobs will show an adult model.
